name: Geometrical Avalanche
description:
This is Geometrical Avalanche!

You will play as the pink cube. To gain points, you just have to let the yellow squares fall down. But if you touch one, you'll lose.

The dark blue squares are different, however. If you pick one up, you'll gain 5 points.

Please note this is only a simple game.

CONTROLS:

Right arrow key - move right

Left arrow key - move left

R - restart

P - go to title screen

DEVELOPMENT PERIOD:

May 15th, 2022 - June 26th, 2022
